entry.title: not leaving your side
entry.summary:
Author: allofmyremains

Rating: Not RatedLanguage: EnglishWords: 1,473Chapters: 1/2Kudos: 0

Summary: “This job is so important to me. It’s my whole life.” His voice began to be more slurred.“I know. Buck,” Eddie moved a little closer and put his hand on his friend’s arm. “You will get back there, I can feel it.”“And what if I won’t?”“We’ll find a solution.”“We?”“Yeah. I don’t plan on leaving your side.”“Okay. Okay, I’m going to hold you to that.”

entry.title: Married At First Sight LA
entry.summary:
Author: tinypeckers

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 11,991Chapters: 3/?Kudos: 19

Summary: Is love a scientific anomaly? This is what the experts of Married of First Sight LA are trying to test in this new reality TV show where strangers are matched to each other based on their personalities, likes and dislikes.Will these hopeful newlyweds find true love amongst the drama? Or will this experiment prove too much for some of our couples? Find out this season on Married At First Sight LA!  Tags will be updated alongside the story.

entry.title: I love you, always and forever
entry.summary:
Author: Never_x_Better

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 67,724Chapters: 12/?Kudos: 92

Summary: Having his first kiss with a man was not on Eddie's 2024 bingo card. But then again, neither was having his parents steal his son, or having to deal with the startling revelation that he was in love with his best friend (who for some reason can't stop getting hurt). If he expected a quiet time in El Paso he really should have known better. It's non-stop drama and stress. He thinks Frank would be a little proud of him though, he's never been so in touch with his feelings.---orEddie fights to figure out who he is at his core, makes up with (and comes out to) his son and takes care of a certain firefighter who must have at this point used up his nine lives.

entry.title: I want to be me (is that not allowed?)
entry.summary:
Author: Tamystardust

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 7,270Chapters: 3/11Kudos: 208

Summary: “Buck?” Eddie called, worried. He was already half out of his chair when Buck came back to the kitchen.Panic all over his face, mouth ajar and breathing fast, he looked between Chris and Eddie. “What’s going on?”“So… just so that we’re on the same page,” Buck whispered, trying to remain collected, but looking at Chris, “you didn’t call your grandparents, right?”“What? No!” Chris replied at the same volume, looking between Buck and Eddie with horror.“What-““Because they’re currently at our front door,” Buck finally said, still a whisper. Eddie tensed so hard a cold sweat broke along his back.

entry.title: Blue November Star
entry.summary:
Author: ash_ptv

Rating: Not RatedLanguage: EnglishWords: 6,303Chapters: 3/?Kudos: 8

Summary: Buck and Eddie have a falling out before Eddie moves to Texas, which means they aren't on speaking terms with each other. Buck feels horrible for how things ended and wants to apologize but isn't sure where to start so he decides he needs to spend some time in Texas to truly show he's sorry and possibly tell Eddie about some unresolved feelings. Unfortunately for Buck, he has an accident and doesn't make it to Texas. His accident causes him to lose his memory. So, Evan "Buck" Buckley no longer remembers his name or the names of his loved ones. How will this accident effect Buck in the long run? How will Eddie react learning his former best friend is hospitalized?

entry.title: Out of Bounds
entry.summary:
Author: avahh_14

Rating: Not RatedLanguage: EnglishWords: 17,013Chapters: 4/?Kudos: 16

Summary: Buck is a football player, Eddie is the “new kid”. After an incident of (dramatically called) humiliation, the football captain, Jonah Greenway, decides he wants to teach Eddie a lesson and chooses him as a bullying target and dragging the other football boys with him, including Buck. Buck with his abandonment issues sees that it’s wrong and doesn’t want to be involved anymore, but he can’t get out right? Jonah is his only friend. He will have no friends and be alone if he doesn’t continue standing alongside the rest of the team. But what happens when one day the English teacher decides to pair the two for a project?

entry.title: that something lovers call fate
entry.summary:
Author: theramblingwriter

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 36,786Chapters: 8/17Kudos: 26

Summary: Buck and Eddie first meet in 2016 when Eddie needs a partner to drive with him and his son from El Paso to LA where he's moving to be with his girlfriend and start a new life with the LAFD.He doesn't think he and Buck are destined to be friends. They probably won't think about each other again.Two years later Buck and Eddie run into each other when Eddie is at a cafe with his wife.Buck wonders if this is the universe giving them a second chance to get to know each other. Neither of them take it.Three more years pass by before they meet again.Eddie transfers to the 118 after his divorce, and Buck's still mourning an unexpected breakup with his girlfriend… but this time, things just seem to click.

entry.title: To Prove That It Haunts Me
entry.summary:
Author: Coffeecrusadeclub

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 3,177Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 69

Summary: “So, this is my official face reveal for the account. A lot of you have noticed an uptick in sad covers lately. Well I won’t get super into it, but a few months ago I realized I was in love with my best friend. He was leaving, moving out of state and in a moment of desperation and fear, I confessed to him outside the airport gates. He didn’t really acknowledge it, and I don’t blame him. Since then, it’s occurred to me that maybe he thought I didn’t mean it. Entirely possible he just doesn’t love me, sure. In either case I need him to know I meant it, and I’m waiting. Eddie Diaz, this is for you.”ooorsecret singer buck with a secret YT channel confesses his feelings to Eddie, Eddie doesn't believe him, so Buck announces it to the world

entry.title: the distance between us shrinks (when I'm talking to you)
entry.summary:
Author: Demiwitchwoodwalker

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 1,869Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 303

Summary: “Anyway, how’d Chris’s chess tournament go?”Buck stood up and walked toward the sink, balancing his phone next to it before turning on the water and starting to scrub his hands. It took Eddie a second to process his words, to force back the dryness of his throat and the words still pushing at his teeth. It just felt so incredibly domestic, the gentle glow of the kitchen around Buck, the every day task of washing his hands in the kitchen, their kitchen, Eddie still as close as he could be when Buck could’ve left his phone on the table and kept talking to him all the same. Warmth spread through his chest, watching as Buck dried his hands and took a plate from the same cabinet Eddie had kept them in, and it wasn’t until Buck sat back down at the table and raised an eyebrow at him that he realized he’d never answered.“I pulled Chris from it early.”-----Or, after everything, Eddie calls Buck. Like he always does.

entry.title: The Bolter
entry.summary:
Author: Jack3402

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 34,255Chapters: 7/?Kudos: 360

Summary: From a very young age, Evan Buckley knew he would end up alone.After Eddie leaves to go after Chris, Buck knows that he needs to get out of Los Angeles for a while. He travels just like he did before he joined the 118, looking for a reason to keep going after losing the family he thought would finally stay.Eddie moves to Texas and slowly but surely gains the trust of his son back. After 4 long months of long conversations and hard realizations, Christopher finally wants to move back to Los Angeles.But what happens when they return and Buck is nowhere to be found, and nobody but Maddie is able to get in contact with him? What happens when Eddie finds out just how badly he hurt the love of his life, and now he can't tell him just how much he truly needs him to be okay?
